text: Charles, Knight Vandenhove (3 July 1927, Teuven – 22 January 2019, Liège) was a Belgian architect. His company Charles Vandenhove et associés is based in Liège, Belgium. He was known for his work in Belgium, the Netherlands and Paris ranging from the 1950s to the 2010s. Vandenhove died of pneumonia in Liège on 22 January 2019, aged 91.L'architecte Charles Vandenhove est décédé == Gallery == File:La Monnaie Brussels.jpg|Extension of La Monnaie, Brussels File:Théâtre de la Ville -les Abbesses.JPG|Extension Thêatre des Abbesses, Paris File:Linker zijgevel van schouwburg - 's-Gravenhage - 20390096 - RCE.jpg|Extension Koninklijke Schouwburg, The Hague File:De Croissant.JPG|De Croissant, The Hague File:CharlesVoscour.jpg|Charles Voscour, Maastricht File:Kanunnikencour, Maastricht.JPG|Kanunnikencour, Maastricht File:P1010110copyBreda.jpg|Poort van Breda File:Dordrecht Statenplein.jpg|Statenplein, Dordrecht ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Belgian businesspeople Category:Belgian architects
